title: Other key categories
content:
CharacteristicWhy It Matters for Architecture
Geographical SpreadNeed for multilingual support, regional rules, time zone handling
Role ComplexityImpacts RBAC design in Azure AD & Power Apps
Process MaturityDetermines automation levels & AI involvement
Compliance NeedsAffects data storage (SharePoint config), audit trail requirements
Integration NeedsDetermines API design, use of Power Automate for connectors
Data VolumeImpacts storage strategy (SQL, Cosmos DB, SharePoint limits)
Self-Service DepthDrives Power Apps design (Model-driven vs Canvas), chatbot depth
AI ReadinessImpacts use of Azure OpenAI, Power Virtual Agents, insights architecture
IT Skill MaturityInfluences customization vs low-code balance
